Components

Buttons

Main buttons

.c-btn--primary, .c-btn--secondary, .c-btn--tertiary

<button class="c-btn c-btn--primary">Primary action</button>
<button class="c-btn c-btn--secondary">Secondary action</button>
<button class="c-btn c-btn--tertiary">Tertiary action</button>

Sizes

.c-btn--sm, .c-btn--lg

<button class="c-btn c-btn--primary c-btn--sm">Primary action small</button>
<button class="c-btn c-btn--primary">Primary action</button>
<button class="c-btn c-btn--primary c-btn--lg">Primary action large</button>

Icons

Accessible SVG Icons with Inline Sprites.

<svg role="img" class="c-icons" focusable="false" aria-hidden="true">
  <title id="icon-add" class="u-sr-only">Menu</title>
  <use xlink:href="assets/icons/sprite/icons.svg#Menu"></use>
</svg>
